header.title: Lisebelisoa tsa Salatiso tsa OHS
sidebar.step_0.title: üìú Amoheloa ho Lisebelisoa tsa Salatiso tsa OHS
sidebar.step_0.description: Sheba lisebelisoa tsa rona tse felletseng le lisebelisoa tsa ho ntlafatsa polokeho ea bophelo bo botle mosebetsing oa hau.
sidebar.step_0.fun_fact: ‚ö° Na u tseba hore ho sebelisa bafani ba lit≈°ebeletso ba nang le boit≈°oaro bo botle ho ka fokotsa likotsi mosebetsing ka ho netefatsa hore mosebetsi o etsoa ka nako le ka maemo a phahameng a polokeho?
intro.title: Amoheloa ho Lisebelisoa tsa Salatiso tsa OHS
intro.description: Sheba lisebelisoa tsa rona tse felletseng le lisebelisoa tsa ho ntlafatsa polokeho ea bophelo bo botle mosebetsing oa hau.
legal_obligations.client.title: Boikarabello ba Mokhasi
legal_obligations.client.reg_5_1_a: Construction Regulation 5(1)(a): Lokisetsa Tlhahlobo ea Kotsi ea Motheo (BRA) e supang likotsi tsa morero.
legal_obligations.client.reg_5_1_b: Construction Regulation 5(1)(b): Fana ka Litlhaloso tsa Bophelo le Polokeho tse hlalosang litlhoko tse khethehileng tsa morero.
legal_obligations.client.reg_5_1_l: Construction Regulation 5(1)(l): Amohela Moralo oa Bophelo le Polokeho oa Mokhasi pele mosebetsi o qala.
legal_obligations.contractor.title: Boikarabello ba Mokhasi
legal_obligations.contractor.reg_7_1_a: Construction Regulation 7(1)(a): Romela Moralo oa Bophelo le Polokeho o thehiloe ho litlhaloso tsa mokhasi.
legal_obligations.contractor.reg_7_1_b: Construction Regulation 7(1)(b): Boloka Faele ea Bophelo le Polokeho setsing e nang le litokomane tsohle tse hlokahalang.
legal_obligations.contractor.reg_9: Construction Regulation 9: Etsa Litlhahlobo tsa Kotsi le Litlhahlobo tsa ho Hlahloba Kotsi (HIRA) tse khethehileng mosebetsing.

legal_obligations.contractor.reg_9.legal_obligations.professional.title: Boikarabello ba Setsebi sa H&S
legal_obligations.contractor.reg_9.legal_obligations.professional.reg_5_5: Construction Regulation 5(5): Baemeli (PrCHSA) ba laola H&S molemong oa mokhasi, ba netefatsa ho latela molao.
legal_obligations.contractor.reg_9.legal_obligations.professional.reg_8_5: Construction Regulation 8(5): Liofisiri (CHSO) li thusa bafani ba lit≈°ebeletso ho kenya t≈°ebetsong le ho hlahloba litsamaiso tsa H&S.
legal_obligations.contractor.reg_9.legal_obligations.professional.sacpcmp: Litataiso tsa SACPCMP: E tlameha ho boloka ngoliso le litlhoko tsa CPD bakeng sa boemo ba setsebi.

legal_obligations.contractor.reg_9.training.title: Koetliso e Felletseng ea Sebaka sa Mosebetsi
legal_obligations.contractor.reg_9.training.description: Sheba mananeo a rona a koetliso a sebaka sa mosebetsi a felletseng ho netefatsa hore ho latela melao ea OHS ea Afrika Boroa le ho khothaletsa tikoloho e bolokehileng ea mosebetsi. Khetha koetliso ea ho sebetsa ka matsoho, koetliso ea sehlopha, kapa sebelisa wizard ea rona ho fumana likhothaletso tse ikhethileng tse thehiloeng indastering ea hau, bamameli ba reriloeng, le sebaka.
legal_obligations.contractor.reg_9.training.action_buttons.view_manual: Reka Manual ea Koetliso e Lokelang
legal_obligations.contractor.reg_9.training.wizard.start: Ka kopo khetha khetho ho qala ts'ebetso ea khothaletso ea koetliso.

legal_obligations.contractor.reg_9.training.cart.checkout.disclaimer: Tlhokomeliso ea SafetyHelp: Lisebelisoa tsa koetliso tse fanoeng ke tsa tlhaiso-leseling feela 'me ha li emele likeletso tsa setsebi. Bakeng sa litharollo tsa OHS tse ikhethileng, ikopanye le SafetyHelp ho support@safetyhelp.co.za kapa etela Leqephe la ho Ikopanya.
legal_obligations.contractor.reg_9.training.checkout.success: Tefo e atlehile! Lisebelisoa tsa hau tsa koetliso li hlophisitsoe. Khoasolla li-PDF tsa hau ka tlase. Bakeng sa koetliso ea marang-rang, likhoutu tsa ho kena li rometsoe ho uena ka i-imeile.
legal_obligations.contractor.reg_9.training.checkout.online_codes: Likhoutu tsa ho Kena tsa Koetliso ea Marang-rang:
legal_obligations.contractor.reg_9.training.providers.title: Bafani ba Koetliso ba Amoheloang
legal_obligations.contractor.reg_9.training.providers.description: Na u hloka koetliso ea motho ka mong? Ikopanye le bafani ba koetliso ba amoheloang bakeng sa litlhoko tsa hau.
legal_obligations.contractor.reg_9.training.providers.provider_1: ABC Training Solutions - E Amoheloa ke SETA - E Ikhethile ho Thuso ea Pele, ho Tima Mollo - Ho Ikopanya: info@abctraining.co.za
legal_obligations.contractor.reg_9.training.providers.provider_2: SafeSkills Academy - E Ngolisitsoe ho SACPCMP - E Ikhethile ho Polokeho ea Kaho - Ho Ikopanya: training@safeskills.co.za
legal_obligations.contractor.reg_9.training.providers.provider_3: SafetyHelp Training - Koetliso e Felletseng ea OHS - Ho Ikopanya: support@safetyhelp.co.za
legal_obligations.contractor.reg_9.training.manual.purchase.title: Reka Manual ea Koetliso e Lokelang
legal_obligations.contractor.reg_9.training.manual.purchase.description: Fumana manual ea koetliso e felletseng e lokiselitsoeng k'hamphani ea hau, e kenyelletsang litlhoko tsa molao, litaba tse khethehileng tsa k'hamphani tse thehiloeng ho boemo ba hau ba kotsi, le litheko tsa bafani ba koetliso ba amoheloang.
legal_obligations.contractor.reg_9.training.manual.risk_profile.title: Hlaka Boemo ba Kotsi ea Manual ea Koetliso ea Hau
legal_obligations.contractor.reg_9.training.manual.risk_profile.label: Boemo ba Kotsi:
legal_obligations.contractor.reg_9.training.manual.risk_profile.error: Ka kopo khetha boemo ba kotsi.
legal_obligations.contractor.reg_9.training.selection_method.title: Khetha Mokhoa oa Hau oa Koetliso
legal_obligations.contractor.reg_9.training.list.all_programs: Mananeo Ohle a Teng a Koetliso
legal_obligations.contractor.reg_9.training.legal_fact.step_1: Nete ea Molao: Molao oa OHS Karolo ea 8 o hloka hore bahiri ba fane ka koetliso e lokiselitsoeng likotsi tse khethehileng tsa sebaka sa mosebetsi.
legal_obligations.contractor.reg_9.training.fun_fact.step_2: Nete e Thabisang: Na u tseba hore koetliso e tloaelehileng e ka fokotsa liketsahalo tsa sebaka sa mosebetsi ho fihla ho 30%?
legal_obligations.contractor.reg_9.training.legal_fact.step_3: Nete ea Molao: Bomasepala ba lehae ba ka ba le melao ea OHS e fapaneng e amang litlhoko tsa koetliso.
legal_obligations.contractor.reg_9.training.fun_fact.step_4: Nete e Thabisang: Libaka tsa mosebetsi tse nang le kotsi e phahameng joalo ka libaka tsa kaho li hloka koetliso e tloaelehileng ho boloka maemo a polokeho.
legal_obligations.contractor.reg_9.training.legal_fact.step_5: Nete ea Molao: Molao oa OHS o laela koetliso e khethehileng bakeng sa likarolo tse kang baemeli ba SHE ho netefatsa ho latela molao.
legal_obligations.contractor.reg_9.legislation.title: Molao oa OHS le Tsamaiso ea Kotsi
legal_obligations.contractor.reg_9.legislation.description: Etsa molao oa OHS le moralo oa tsamaiso ea kotsi o lokiselitsoeng khoebo ea hau. Kenya lintlha tsa k'hamphani ea hau, mesebetsi, le likotsi ho fumana pampiri e felletseng ea ho latela e kenyelletsang molao oa Afrika Boroa, melao ea bomasepala, le maemo a machabeng.
legal_obligations.contractor.reg_9.legislation.wizard.title: Etsa RMP ea Hau

legal_obligations.contractor.reg_9.legislation.wizard.step_4.title: Mohato oa 4 ho tse 4: Lekola le ho Etsa
legal_obligations.contractor.reg_9.legislation.wizard.step_4.description: Lekola lintlha tseo u faneng ka tsona 'me u etse RMP ea hau. U ka eketsa molao o mong haeba ho hlokahala.
legal_obligations.contractor.reg_9.legislation.wizard.step_4.additional_leg: Eketsa Molao o Mong (O ka Ikhethela):
legal_obligations.contractor.reg_9.legislation.cart.title: Tefo
legal_obligations.contractor.reg_9.legislation.cart.description: RMP ea hau e hlophisitsoe! Sebelisa khoutu ea vawut≈°ha FREERMP2025 ho khoasolla mahala (batho ba pele ba 100).
legal_obligations.contractor.reg_9.suppliers.title: Lenane la Bafani ba OHS
legal_obligations.contractor.reg_9.suppliers.description: Fumana le ho beha bafani ba OHS Afrika Boroa. Batla ka sebaka, lit≈°ebeletso, le litifikeiti. Romela litlhahlobo ho thusa ba bang ho etsa liqeto tse nang le tsebo.
legal_obligations.contractor.reg_9.suppliers.list.title: Lenane la Bafani
legal_obligations.contractor.reg_9.suppliers.table.name: Lebitso la Mofani

legal_obligations.contractor.reg_9.community_tools.title: Lisebelisoa tsa Polokeho ea Sechaba
legal_obligations.contractor.reg_9.community_tools.description: Tlaleha ketsahalo efe kapa efe ea polokeho kapa kotsi sechabeng sa hau kapa sebakeng sa hau sa mosebetsi, ho tloha ho likoti ho ea ho lisebelisoa tse senyehileng. Sebelisa lisebelisoa tsa rona ho netefatsa polokeho libakeng tse kang mabenkele a spaza, likolo, lipetlele, le libara.
legal_obligations.contractor.reg_9.community_tools.incident_report.title: Tlaleha Ketsahalo kapa Kotsi
legal_obligations.contractor.reg_9.community_tools.incident_report.photo_la: Khoasolla Set≈°oant≈°o sa Ketsahalo (O ka Ikhethela):
legal_obligations.contractor.reg_9.community_tools.incident_report.location: Sebaka se tla fumaneha ka boiketsetso...
legal_obligations.contractor.reg_9.community_tools.incident_report.weather_: Boemo ba leholimo bo tla fumaneha ka boiketsetso...
legal_obligations.contractor.reg_9.community_tools.incident_report.descript: Hlaka ketsahalo kapa kotsi (mohl., koti ho Main Street, setulo se robehileng setsing sa sechaba)...
legal_obligations.contractor.reg_9.community_tools.incident_report.user_con: Lintlha tsa ho Ikopanya tsa Hau (O ka Ikhethela):
Kenya mohala kapa i-imeile ea hau...
legal_obligations.contractor.reg_9.community_tools.incident_report.user_soc: Handle ea Hau ea Litaba tsa Sechaba (O ka Ikhethela, mohl., @username ho X):
Kenya handle ea hau ea X...
legal_obligations.contractor.reg_9.community_tools.incident_report.provider: Lintlha tsa ho Ikopanya tsa Mofani oa T≈°ebeletso (O ka Ikhethela):
Kenya mohala kapa i-imeile (e tla tlatsoa ka boiketsetso haeba mofani a khethiloe)...
Handle ea Litaba tsa Sechaba ea Mofani oa T≈°ebeletso (O ka Ikhethela, mohl., @CityofJoburgZA ho X):
Kenya handle ea X (e tla tlatsoa ka boiketsetso haeba mofani a khethiloe)...

legal_obligations.contractor.reg_9.community_tools.list.spaza_shop.title: Lenane la Polokeho la Lebenkele la Spaza
legal_obligations.contractor.reg_9.community_tools.list.spaza_shop.descript: Netefatsa hore lebenkele la hau la spaza le fihlela litlhoko tsa polokeho ea mollo, motlakase, le sebopeho ho latela melao ea bomasepala le Molao oa OHS.
legal_obligations.contractor.reg_9.community_tools.list.school.title: Tataiso ea Polokeho ea Mollo ea Sekolo
legal_obligations.contractor.reg_9.community_tools.list.school.description: Ithute litlhoko tsa molao tsa polokeho ea mollo likolong, ho kenyelletsa merero ea ho tsoa le lisebelisoa.

legal_obligations.contractor.reg_9.community_tools.list.hospital.descriptio: Netefatsa hore lipetlele li itokiselitse maemo a t≈°ohanyetso ka merero e nepahetseng ea ho tsoa le lisebelisoa tsa polokeho.
legal_obligations.contractor.reg_9.community_tools.list.tavern.title: Lenane la Polokeho la Tavern
legal_obligations.contractor.reg_9.community_tools.list.tavern.description: Lekola hore na libara li latela melao ea polokeho ea mollo le tsamaiso ea bongata ho thibela liketsahalo.

legal_obligations.contractor.reg_9.dashboard.welcome: Amoheloa, [Lebitso la Mesebetsi]! Laola ho latela ha hau OHS, RMPs, litlhahlobo tsa bafani, le lipampiri tsa sechaba mona.

legal_obligations.contractor.reg_9.document_categories.title: Hlophisa Litokomane tsa Lenaneo la Hau la Tsamaiso ea OHS
legal_obligations.contractor.reg_9.document_categories.description: Khetha le ho hlophisa litokomane tseo u li hlokang bakeng sa lenaneo la hau la tsamaiso ea OHS. Khetha ho tsoa ho lipolisi, lits'ebetso, maemo, le tse ling, tse lokiselitsoeng litlhoko tsa mokhatlo oa hau.

legal_obligations.contractor.reg_9.document_categories.policies.description: Lipolelo tsa maemo a phahameng tsa maikemisetso le boitlamo, tse amoheloang ke batsamaisi ba phahameng.
